title: Rebuild and Redeploy Al Buraimi Bird Atlas Without Code Changes

requirements.summary: Rebuild and redeploy the current project state without making any code changes. Verify all frontend files compile correctly and all routes, components, and features remain functional after deployment.
acceptanceCriteria: The project builds and deploys successfully without any source code modifications
All frontend routes are accessible and render their respective page components
Admin-only action buttons (إضافة, تعديل, حفظ, حذف, تحرير) are visible and functional in BirdDataTable for authenticated admin users
Admin-only action buttons (إضافة, حفظ, حذف, تحرير) are visible and functional in BirdGallery for authenticated admin users
The HamburgerMenu dropdown is visible in the header and navigates correctly to all sections
The HomePage renders with splash screen, hero section, navigation cards, map upload section, and team table
The AllLocationsMap renders the interactive Leaflet map with bird filtering and show/hide toggle
No source file is modified during this deployment

file_operations.description: Verify the TanStack Router configuration with all registered routes (/data, /gallery, /map, /bird/:name, /eagle-owl, /statistics, /image-view, /permissions) compiles and bundles correctly without any changes to the source code. This operation ensures the routing structure remains intact during rebuild.
